title: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Apologies for the poor title, but I'm not sure what to put there… 🙂 ### Code https://gist.github.com/0f61ed0d930363d807431f16cb055b5a ### Meta ``` rustc 1.58.0-nightly (65c55bf93 2021-11-23) binary: rustc commit-hash: 65c55bf931a55e6b1e5ed14ad8623814a7386424 commit-date: 2021-11-23 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.58.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 2 but the index is 2', compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/diagnostics/mutability_errors.rs:450:53 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.58.0-nightly (65c55bf93 2021-11-23) running on aarch64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [mir_borrowck] borrow-checking `q24::solve` #1 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack error: could not compile `adventofcode` ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling adventofcode v0.1.0 (/Users/bwinton/Programming/advent-of-code) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 2 but the index is 2', compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/diagnostics/mutability_errors.rs:450:53 stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: core::panicking::panic_bounds_check 3: ::report_mutability_error 4: ::access_place 5: ::visit_statement_before_primary_effect 6: ::visit_results_in_block::, rustc_index::bit_set::BitSet, rustc_index::bit_set::BitSet>, rustc_borrowck::dataflow::BorrowckAnalyses, rustc_mir_dataflow::framework::engine::Results, rustc_mir_dataflow::framework::engine::Results>, rustc_borrowck::MirBorrowckCtxt> 7: rustc_mir_dataflow::framework::visitor::visit_results::, rustc_index::bit_set::BitSet, rustc_index::bit_set::BitSet>, rustc_borrowck::dataflow::BorrowckAnalyses, rustc_mir_dataflow::framework::engine::Results, rustc_mir_dataflow::framework::engine::Results>, core::iter::adapters::map::Map, rustc_borrowck::MirBorrowckCtxt> 8: rustc_borrowck::do_mir_borrowck 9: ::enter:: 10: rustc_borrowck::mir_borrowck 11: >::call_once 12: >::with_task:: 13: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<(&rustc_middle::mir::query::BorrowCheckResult, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job::{closure#3}> 14: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 15: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 16: ::time::<(), rustc_interface::passes::analysis::{closure#2}> 17: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 18: >::with_task::> 19: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<(core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job>::{closure#3}> 20: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>> 21: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 22: ::enter::> 23: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 24: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 25: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 26: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.58.0-nightly (65c55bf93 2021-11-23) running on aarch64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [mir_borrowck] borrow-checking `q24::solve` #1 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack error: could not compile `adventofcode` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: build failed```
